creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons and Dr. Rosa Lynn Pinkus
description: roughly U-shaped, with open central bottom section and two triangular descending elements at center; black ground decorated with multicolored (primarily salmon) flower sprays and medallions; salmon pink fabric trim
dimension: 69 1/4 x 127 1/4 in. (175.9 x 323.22 cm) (without hanging loops)
title: Tush kyiz (hanging)
